carousel.title: Mivar Research Institute
carousel.subtitle: LOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
carousel.content: Innovator in the field of intelligent information technologies and artificial intelligence systems

carousel.title: Next generation expert systems
carousel.content: Mivar approach lays the foundation for unifying all existing and perspective developments in the field of intelligent expert systems

carousel.title: Semantic analysis and text processing in natural language
carousel.content: Application of mivar technologies allows us to overcome principal limitations of natural Russian language understanding

carousel.title: Intelligent robot management
carousel.content: The mivar approach allows us to solve the problem of high-performance robot intellectualization without limitations concerning volume of knowledge base

carousel.title: Intelligent image recognition
carousel.content: The mivar approach allows us to describe heterogeneous sets of graphical data in human terms
